q: Reflecting on the Arizona shootings that killed six people and badly wounded Rep. Gabrielle Giffords , Colin Powell said he was dismayed by the harsh tenor of political debate that some have said may have contributed to the attack. There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do, he said. "All sorts of nastiness. And it is not just politicians who are doing this to each other, and, frankly, politics has always been a contact sport in this country, but with

." Michael Vick was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410. I'm going to try to put on a great show for the fans, Michael Vick said. In the past, Michael Vick 's running is largely what got him into the Pro Bowl. He takes satisfaction that his passing was better than it has ever been this season.

"What scares me is that if this building is , it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still smoldering NDP headquarters.
